storyInfo: Randall gets a letter from his parents while studying in Leithanien, which turns out to be a practical joke. Someone should teach these amateurs what a REAL practical joke looks like.

attributes.text: Dear Randall. I know your father and I have not written to you since you left Laterano.
While we have both willingly taken up heavy responsibilities in our work, that is no excuse to neglect the things that we should truly cherish.

Perhaps we should not have been so quick to accept your impetuous request to study in a distant land. It is only after experiencing the journey for ourselves that we realized that it is taking enough time for us to complete half a cycle of workâ€”
Yes, we are coming to Leithanien to see you. We are already on our way.
There is no need to write back. We may even have already arrived by the time you receive this letter. I have included the address of the hotel we will stay at.
We will be waiting for you there, even if you are still angry about what you might have perceived as indifference.

attributes.content: Letter for you, Randall Hofstadter.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I don't recall having any friends who would write to me.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: A person's heart is as fickle as the weather, just like that downpour a few days ago that soaked all the letters I was carrying. Sorry, but the sender's name got too blurry to read. I hope that won't be a problem?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: None whatsoever. Looks like it's from my mother back home. Thank you, sir.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: That's good to hear. Have a nice day.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Payne! Did you do what I told you to?
attributes.name: Arrogant Student

attributes.content: Look how scared he is. What a wimp.
attributes.name: Scornful Student

attributes.content: I-I did, Herr Viktor.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: See what I said, Britney? Payne would never let his 'friends' down. How did he react?
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: I'm not sure... Randall might not have believed my story... Maybe we shouldn'tâ€”
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: If he didn't, then you'll be in deep trouble, Payne.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It's not easy, is it, studying in Leithanien by yourself? Your talent with Arts and studiousness habits are admirable. Surely the university's scholarship is intended just for knowledge-seekers like you.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: But who knows what might happen before everything's decided?
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Scholarship candidates are subject to stringent checks. Perhaps you'd find it simple to pass the end-term exams with top grades, but the final decision is the committee's to make.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: And your uncle sits on that committee...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: The list of recipients won't be made public until next week.
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: I... I'll make sure that Randall comes.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: That's more like it.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Be careful. That's a tall stack of books.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: S-Sorry, Randall.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: You know me?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Er... we took the same elective?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: We did. Your novel views on compatible Originium-energy conversion methods for existing Arts Units gave Professor Edwin quite the headache.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Er, heh... at least he was fair with his grading.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Less so for me. Theory has never been my area of interest, though. There will be few advances in those concepts, even given another five or six decades.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: My toxicology class is in another wing. Have a nice day.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: We seem to be running into each other rather frequently these days. It's almost enough to make me suspect a scheme is at play.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Oh, what an interesting reaction.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: It's not easy finding a friend in a foreign land. We're both international students, after all.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I've been away from home for so long that I've almost forgotten what my family looked like. They... don't write often.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I did recently receive a letter from my mother.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: What did you think about it... no, I mean, is something the matter?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: My parents wanted to see me, but I'm not sure if I want to see them.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: You must! Er... whatever happens, surely your family care about you.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Are you telling me to go and meet them?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: O-Of course not! It's your choice.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I'll take it into consideration... Perhaps I'll write back to them in a few days.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Y-You will go meet them, won't you?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Why do you seem even more anxious than I am? As you said, the choice is mine.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Oh dear, oh dear... If he refuses, how do I explain it to Herr Viktor?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Wait, Messenger!
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Oh, good afternoon, Randall.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Was there something wrong with the letter?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: No, thank you for bringing me my mother's message. But some things are hard to say out loud, after being away from one's family for so long. She said there was no need to write back, but...
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: True, those who've wandered far from home are always hesitant to face their family. I'm willing to deliver a letter for you, but... not to the return address, I'm afraid.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: That won't be an issue. They gave me the address of where they're currently staying. Just deliver it there.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: No problem. I hope you have a lovely reunion.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Thank you. I think I will.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: It's not easy, is it? Studying abroad. Not that my job's easy either. Nowâ€”
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: O-One moment, please!
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Hello, Payne!
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Are you finally ready to send a letter yourself? Two outlanders, both about to reunite with their families. Blessings to you all!
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: No, I'm not sending a letter... I just wanted to ask, could you give me Randall's letter? I'll deliver it for him.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: No can do. How could I make a child do my job for me and still collect the wages for it?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: It's alright, sir. I'm very familiar with Bachshof.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: You know the address?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Er... I... R-Randall's my best friend! His parents did come to Leithanien, but... but they've changed accommodation due to, er, unforeseen reasons.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I happened to run into them on the street. If you send it to the old address, they won't get Randall's heartfelt letter, soâ€”
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Slow down and take a deep breath, okay?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I see. So you're saying Randall's a really dear friend of yours, and you don't want anything to go wrong with his family reunion?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Well, aren't you a good egg? Sure, I'll leave the letter to you. And maybe next time, I'll be delivering your letter to your own family.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: We've known each other for three years, so don't be shy now. Parents are always glad to hear from their children, no matter what happened in the past.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Thank you, sir. I'll... think about it.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Please... Please let the answer be yes...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Th-Thank goodness! He'll be there tomorrow night. I must tell Herr Viktor and Frau Britney so that they could prepare.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: So he doesn't get along too well with his family either. And all this about research... Heh, of course it's about work.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: 'Please do not expect too much from this meeting. Of course I am glad you are here, but the unfamiliar sights of Leithanien's streets are a constant reminder that I am alone.'
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Yes, he's alone too, but...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.text: But who knows what might happen before everything's decided...
...the final decision is the committee's to make.

attributes.content: Herr Viktor would have my head. I must do this, Iâ€”
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I must reconsider this...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It's almost time, Britney.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: What a taskmaster.
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: Show our new toy a little respect. It'll be ours for a long time.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Are you sure he's coming? Our time is valuable. If he's still not here at the appointed timeâ€”
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Then I kiss my scholarship and my last year of peaceful student life goodbye.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I know, Herr Viktor. You don't need to repeat yourself.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It's only been a few days since we saw you, and you're finally learning to talk back? Actually, I like it better that way.
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: Shh, someone's coming. Get your Arts Unit ready, Payne. On my mark...
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: What are you doing, dummkopf?!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: No. 2 Fuga Street... is this the place?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Are you Randall Hofstadter?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Yes, that's me.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I'm a Messenger for Bachshof. A Sankta couple requested that I meet you here.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: When did you learn to lie like that? An accident and surgery bills? I can hardly believe he actually bought it.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: It's difficult for international students to get timely news from home, and there's no way to quickly verify its authenticity. The same goes for our thoughts, worries, regrets... we can't communicate them to our family.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Find his weakness, and he'll be your most 'loyal' friend for the next few years.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Hm... you're right.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Is that package his most valuable possession? Hardly enough for the medical bills if his poor parents really did encounter an accident in a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: What did you expect from a Sankta runt? I say we're better off using him to try out new Arts.
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: Randall's parents are scholars on Lateran firearms. Their research institute is officially sponsored. His family should be fairly well-to-do.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I'm sure even your fathers would be pleased if he happens to have any of their research notes with him.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Since when did you know him so well?
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: It took three years, but you're finally getting the hang of it! Shame you're graduating next year. I won't forget our friendship, Payne.
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Neither will I, Herr Viktor.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Do you smell something? Some kind of... aroma?
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Hmph, a gift obtained through trickery is hardly a proper gift. Besides, my birthday's already past.
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: *cough* I smell it now too... what's this? Wait, the box is empty? Damn, that Sankta tricked us... why does your face look so funny, Viktor?
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: Like yours is any better... No, something's not right. Someone's running up my toes! Or... am I sinking? Arts that change the terrain?
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: The ground's shaking... give me a hand, Viktorâ€”what's this? Green slime? My jeweled ring... no, my finger's gone! I think I'm...
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: Melting.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: When you saw a friendless foreign student, did it ever occur to you that I might be choosing to avoid people?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Corrode and dissolve. Those are my Originium Arts, and my innate talent.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I rarely share this with others. Few are willing to delve into the principles of death and decay. So am I fit to be your new 'friend' now?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Payne?
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: I should have known! You outlanders were in league with each other! You'll pay for this, traitor!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Don't bother. I already paid the ultimate price for taking part in your malicious joke.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: A practical joke?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Randall... I was the one who wrote that letter.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: The children of some nobles made me to write it to trick you... Don't go to the meeting tomorrow!
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I knew it was fake.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: No stamp, no signature, no smell of gun lubricant. Besides, those two never showed the slightest concern when I chose to study in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: In fact, they were relieved, as though my choice had spared them a headache. However, from when I was at a young age, the real 'problem child' of the family was always their research.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Even here in Leithanien, that 'brother' of mine who stole all their attention would never let me go so easily.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Greedy and shortsighted competitors are always trying to steal their research secrets through me. So why should I go easy on the enemies who look down on me?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Most scholars came to Leithanien to delve into the secrets of Originium Arts. I'm no exception.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Sometimes, however, toxicology offers a more effective solution to my 'problems'. A little bit of special ink is enough to turn sweet words into a deadly trap.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: But I should have known that those politicians who continue to wrap themselves in a scholar's garb even after leaving the institute would not be so careless in their forgery.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Alas, I had assumed this was one of those 'problems'.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Wait, do you mean... no!
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It seems there's been a little misunderstanding between us.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: But you started it. I have no reason to apologize.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Hah... haha... I knew it wouldn't end well when I agreed to be their accomplice. I'm the very definition of a scapegoat.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: But I didn't expect the price to be so high...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I'm sure it's hard to accept. But you can mull over the results of your poor decisions in your own room.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Unless you're planning to take revenge on me? I don't mind, but you'd need to be smarter about it.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: How long do I have...?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Based on experience, no less than three days, no more than one week.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Viktor knows you're coming.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Of course he does. That's why I set the bait. I can't let this practical joke end so easily.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I was preparing my payback before you knocked on my door. It's the perfect opportunity to try out my new solution. Consider it reviewing for the end-term exam.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Count me in.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Oh? And why should I trust a traitor?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: It's true I decided to study abroad partly to get away from my family, but I chose this university to pursue knowledge, not to become a noble's gofer.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: They've always been my enemies.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Traitor!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Is that the only word he knows? I can't imagine how you let a small-fry like him walk all over you for three years.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Their methods are pathetic even by bully standardsâ€”archaic, ineffective, devoid of creativity.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I don't know. I guess I just wanted to have a peaceful school life, but my obedience ended up putting me in even greater peril.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Look, they can't even stand.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: S-Stop your Arts! Get the school nurse, o-or else! Don't you want your scholarship anymore, Payne?
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: And you, Randall! Private use of offensive Arts is strictly forbidden! You'll be expelled! You won't be welcome in either Leithanien or Laterano!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: You understand neither your own situation nor my Originium Arts. These aren't offensive Arts, just hallucinations created by my solution.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: A hallucination? Impossible! I'm certain this pain is real! It's reached my waist... stop! You won't fool us!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: I hate it when I have to explain a practical joke. Can't you figure it out yourself?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: To everyone else, you just fell to the ground on your own and started shouting nonsense while pulling at your own hair and legs. I didn't actually hurt you at all.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Everything you're seeing about your body parts melting, that's just a hobby of mine. The school's rules are too restrictive, so that humble dream of mine only has a place in hallucinations.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: You monster...
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Thank you, I try.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Viktor, Britney. You're not going to tell anyone what happened tonight, and Randall's 'practical joke' will leave no trace.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: If you tell your dear uncle, there's another near-death hallucination in store for you. Randall has kindly agreed to share the formula for his solution.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Just say yes, Viktor! I can't feel my leg anymore! Hurry!
attributes.name: Britney

attributes.content: I know!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: I-I won't tell anyone what happened tonight. L-Let us go! Please!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Are you going to find any new 'friends'?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Absolutely not! I swear! You're the last one! No, not even you anymore! I won't cause any trouble for you!
attributes.name: Viktor

attributes.content: Randall.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: The experiment is a success. Thank you for the screams. Now I'll let you go, as a reward for being such cooperative test subjects.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: That's... it? All the dark clouds that have hung over my head for three years, gone just like that?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It wasn't so complicated.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: No innocent student needs to be bullied and insulted, no getting punched and kicked after a failed plan, and I get to keep my scholarship too?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It was so simple to resist. Why didn't I understand that until now? But I...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I still won't apologize.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: You don't need to. Evil deeds deserve to be punished. It's my just deserts.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: But can I ask you to send a letter for me?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: This letter is for your parents?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: They didn't want me to study here in Leithanien. They're merchants who've been running a family business for generations. As their only child, I'm set to inherit it.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Arts tomes were my only companions in my lonely childhood. My parents didn't know Originium Arts, nor were they interested. They just let me do it because I liked it.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I didn't want to bow my head and seek their help, even as I was being treated like that.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: But I still went to the post office every day to check my mail, dreaming that one day they would show they cared. So just in case, I had this reply letter ready to send without hesitation.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: But there's no point in being stubborn now, in butting heads. I miss my mom's jam tart. I know she made it from off-the-shelf pre-prepared packages, but she always added her own spices.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I don't like desserts.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: But if you miss it, you can always go home.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Hah... very funny. How much longer do I have left? Two days? Five?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Barring any accidents, at least a few decades, I would think.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: ...Is that a joke?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It's not. That ink wasn't a deadly poison. You'll still have the chance to taste that tart again, though I don't think it sounds especially appetizing.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I just wanted to scare you, but I guess you were more than just a bookworm... Disappointed?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: No... I... *sob*... I've never been so happy...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Alright, wipe those tears off your face. That wasn't the reaction I expected.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Thanks, Randall. Look... I'm crying so much my hands are growing numb...
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Huh? My... my hands?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I said it wasn't deadly poison. I didn't say it wasn't poison.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Just a little edema that will make you lose the use of your fingers. They should go back to normal in 72 hours. A much lighter punishment than death, don't you think? Although, now at I think of itâ€”
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: You'll miss the first exam of finals week. Looks like you can kiss your scholarship goodbye after all.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Ha... I should have known. That's more like you.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: You're the one who wrote that 'challenge'. Of course you're in line for the 'payback'. Besides, it was rather irritating watching you cower and grovel before those two.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Not anymore.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Well... you've solved one problem for me, but brought another.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: How will I pay my tuition for next year?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Talk to your folks.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: You already have the letters written. Just change a few words.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Do you know how I saw through the fake letter?
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: You said it was a careless forgery.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: They don't write to me.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Paper, tone, smellâ€”it wasn't any of that detective story BS. The letter itself was meaningless.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: They would never offer me a single word of concern, much less write such a sappy letterâ€”not that I expect anything from them.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: That was the letter that you were hoping for.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Your parents cared about you. You wanted to prove that you're still important to them, and even prepared a response ahead of time.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: It's all so silly, isn't it?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: It is.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: But not because you wrote the letter. Because you wrote it, yet didn't have the courage to send it.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: I'm not telling you to bow your head to them. I'm sure you made the right choice, and they made plenty of wrong ones.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: If they see it as a sign of weakness, then be frustrated, be angry, tear the paper to pieces, and tell them it's not.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Do whatever you want.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: How can you always be so confident in your choices?
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Because there's no one to tell me I made the wrong ones.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Haha... I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: No, I'll send it as soon as my hand heals!
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: Thanks, Randall.
attributes.name: Payne

attributes.content: I told you, that's not the reaction I wanted.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Alright. My reply letter has been safely disposed of, and the practical joke has come to a close. As for this fake letter from Payne...
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: Yeah... doesn't sound anything like what those two would say.
attributes.name: Randall

attributes.content: But it'll make a decent souvenir.
attributes.name: Randall
